entry.title: Ethical Journalism: Values Worth Fighting For

media:group.media:title: Ethical Journalism: Values Worth Fighting For
media:group.media:description:
Susan McKay, Irelandโs Press Ombudsperson, joins host Eric Hacopian to discuss how to promote ethical journalism at a time when the field is beset by distrust and disinformation. McKay shares her experience promoting the principles of traditional journalism through press councils that adjudicate complaints about reporting and how they can help build trust in the media and protect democracy.

entry.title: Aurora panelists share insights on global displacement

media:group.media:title: Aurora panelists share insights on global displacement
media:group.media:description:
During a panel discussion at the Human Rights and Humanitarian Forum in Los Angeles in May 2024, experts, lawyers, and activists gathered to discuss the global refugee crisis, the rise in forced displacement, and potential solutions . Organized by the Aurora Humanitarian Initiative in collaboration with UCLAโs The Promise Institute for Human Rights, the discussion was moderated by Nasra Ismail, U.S. Enterprise Executive Director at Alight. Speakers included UCLA Law Professor Ahilan Arulanantham, Founder of Empower Rez Gardi, Chief of Mission at IOM Mexico Dana Graber Ladek, and The Sentry Co-Founder John Prendergast.

media:group.media:description:
Zara Nazarian est une amoureuse de lโArmรฉnie et de la langue franรงaise. Ce ne sont pas les occasions qui ont manquรฉ de faire sa vie ailleurs, mais lโappel des montagnes du Caucase รฉtait bien trop fort. Aprรจs une partie de vie passรฉe en France, Zara Nazarian, journaliste pour toujours, a finalement posรฉ ses bagages en Armรฉnie en 2004. Le franรงais, et surtout la francophonie en tรชte, elle a crรฉรฉ le Courrier dโErevan, le premier mรฉdia dโinformation basรฉ en Armรฉnie, entiรจrement en franรงais. Discussion autour des รฉvรฉnements qui ont marquรฉ la journaliste de lโindรฉpendance de lโArmรฉnie ร la fin du Haut Karabakh.

ิฑิบ ึีธีญีถีกีญีกีฃีกีฐีซ ีญีธึีฐึีคีกีฏีกีถ ีีฅึีฃีฅีต ีีธึึีกีคีตีกีถีจ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ิฑึีทีกีฌีธึีตีฝ ีีฒีคีฅีฝีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีด ีถีฅึีฏีกีตีกึีถีธึีด ีง ีฟีฅีญีถีธีฌีธีฃีซีกีฏีกีถ ีธีฌีธึีฟีซ ีดีกีฝีทีฟีกีขีกีตีซีถ ีกีปีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ึ ึีฅีถีฝีคึีกีฏีกีถ ึีกีฉีฅีฉีจ: ีึีก ีญีธีฝึีธีพี ีธีฌีธึีฟีซีถ ีฟีกึีฅีฏีกีถ 90 ีดีฌีถ ีคีธีฌีกึีซึ ีกีพีฅีฌีซ ีกีปีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีฏีฟึีกีดีกีคึีพีซ ีฅีฏีกีดีฟีกีตีซีถ ีฐีกึีฏีซ, ีทีกีฐีธึีฉีกีฐีกึีฏีซ ึ ีทึีปีกีถีกีผีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฐีกึีฏีซ ีกึีฟีธีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ ีฟีฅีฝึีธีพ: ีีกีฟีธึีฏ ีธึีทีกีคึีธึีฉีตีธึีถ ีง ีคีกึีฑีพีฅีฌ ีทีกีฐีกีผีธึีถีฅึีซ ีฌีกีตีถ ีทึีปีกีถีกีฏีซี ีฃีฅึึีธึึ ีฑีฅีผีถีกึีฏีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซึ ีดีซีถีนึ ีญีธีทีธึ ีขีซีฆีถีฅีฝ, ีกีตีค ีฉีพีธึีดี ีผีฅีฌีธีฏีกึีพีกีฎ ีจีถีฏีฅึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีจ ึ ีคึีกีถึ ีฝีฟีธึีกีขีกีชีกีถีธึีดีถีฅึีจ:
